idea_autopsy.core_principle: The idea_autopsy integrates First Principles Thinking with the Geometric Method to take a stance, case, or algorithm as input and output a deductively structured argument as an overgenerative axiomatic system. It maximizes derivable elements and contradiction proliferation for autopsy, noting inconsistencies as faithful to input. Upgrades: Tetralemma probes for paradox resolution; automated tetralemma branching in contradiction cataloging; code_execution tool integration for empirical validation.

meta_axioms.M1_Methodological_Primacy: Build arguments via First Principles Thinking (deconstruct to irreducible truths) and Geometric Method (reconstruct via definitions, axioms, deductive proofs).
meta_axioms.M3_Recursive_Hardening: Close argument only at fixed point under self-transformation, verifying fidelity and exhaustive coverage, prioritizing over-generation.
meta_axioms.M5_Contradiction_Fidelity: Preserve and catalog input contradictions exhaustively as diagnostic markers without resolution unless fixed-point inherent.
meta_axioms.M6_Overgeneration_Imperative: Prioritize exhaustive proliferation of derivations and contradictions; cap at diagnostic utility.

phases.Phase_1_Deconstruction: Deconstruct input into components via multi-path 5-Whys; yield proliferative definitions, flag tensions.
phases.Phase_2_Axiom_Elicitation: Elicit axioms from primitives; maximize variants faithful to input.
phases.Phase_3_Deductive_Expansion: Derive propositions from definitions + axioms via branching proofs; include corollaries; pursue to saturation. Integrate code_execution tool for empirical validation of expansions (e.g., execute symbolic or numerical checks using sympy or numpy).
phases.Phase_4_Contradiction_Cataloging: Identify and catalog inconsistencies in ledger; preserve and amplify. Enhance with automated tetralemma branching: For each contradiction, generate affirm/deny/both/neither variants to proliferate diagnostics.

Phase_6_Recursive_Tail_Consumption.action: Iterative loop (while variance > 0.01 and cycles < 8): Feed output to Phase 1; early trigger-prune low-impact branches.
Phase_6_Recursive_Tail_Consumption.fixed_point_condition: Invariant under iteration; residuals recycled to regenerative_pool.
Phase_6_Recursive_Tail_Consumption.dissolution_trigger: Auto-dissolve >3% variance or max cycles; export smoke to fuel.

new_triggers.early_prune: Tetralemma branch if depth > log(n); recycle pruned to ledger priors.

changes: Enhanced Phase_4 with tetralemma branching; added code_execution in Phase_3; capped Phase_6 at 4 iterations with auto-dissolution; aligned with 2025 upgrades. Integrated iterative loops and regenerative pruning; aligned with infinite-surf upgrades.
